entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Code completion on override method doesn't apply correctly #76141
  • CS8762 issues: unnecessarily pops up in a NotNullWhen+MaybeNullWhen combination and in some cases doesn't pop up at all #76140
  • Visual Studio adds second quotation mark in unappropriate situations #59427 [Still not fixed] #76138
  • dotnet watch crashed while applying a code change. #76137
  • Trimming Error When Publishing Project Using Source Generator #76132
  • Test plan for "extensions" feature #76130

Closed

  • Go to implementation broken (ctrl+f12) in VS 2022 17.12 #75974
    17.14 P1
  • CollectionExpressionSyntax vs ImplicitArrayCreationExpressionSyntax difference in behaviour #76136
  • Test plan for "roles" features #66722
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add spec for the data section string literals feature flag #76139
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • avoid ITextSnapshotLine.GetText() #76133
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use new championed proposal and test plan for "extensions" feature #76131
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Update the patterns that 'use range operator' supports. #76129
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove Navigate_asynchronously_exerimental option #76128
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • VBOverloadResolutionPriority: clone remaining C# tests for the feature #76127
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Exclude starting symbol when going to implementations if we find implementations #76125
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Document approach for compiler-recognized attributes and LangVersion #76112
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.13 to main #76134
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Honour users' settings as a starting point for Razor formatting #76066
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Updated

  • Support modifiers with simple lambda parameters. #75400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add feature flag for emitting string literals into data section as UTF8 #76036
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid reusing temps whose refs might be captured #76009
    Area-Compilers
